extendedInfo.description: Winner of the 2011 Local Search Association Industry Excellence Award!!!EveryCarListed.comÂ® app for on-the-go car buyersâ¦ Pay the Right Price with Vehicle Values from BLACK BOOKÂ® Check the value of a specific year, make/model, and trim using data from Black BookÂ®, a guide published by National Auto Research that provides vehicle pricing data. Black Book is a nationwide source for vehicle valuations. Payment and Affordability Calculator At the dealership wondering how much vehicle you can afford or what your payment will be? Our handy tool can help you calculate both. Search for the Vehicle of Your Dreams Now you can search for new, used and certified vehicles, locate dealers and get directions directly to the dealership. Still not sure about a vehicle? Share the listing on Facebook to see what your friends think!

reviews.title: Best Car App!
reviews.comment: Phenomenal app! Saved lots of time, great deals and photos, very user friendly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It does NOTHING
reviews.comment: Out of over 20 large dealers it could not find one within 50 miles
reviews.author: Richard Wilson

reviews.comment: Great app! A must when shopping for used cars. So much easier to use than kbb.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Search is pretty limited!
reviews.comment: I was hoping to search for all hatchbacks (all makes/models) but can\'t! Could you add a search for model type (hatchback/sedan/etc.)?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Waste of My Time ....
reviews.comment: This app says it has no dealership or cars in my area - BOOOOOO, I Live less than one mile from a dealership that sells : Buick, GMC, Chevrolet, Ford & Honda & Several other dealers in the vicinity - SMH - {~_~} \"UNINSTALL\"
reviews.author: DWAYNE HILLERY

reviews.comment: Great app, easier to find the vehicle I wanted, better details, lots of pix.. showed app to salesman n got a great deal!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Its fast with a great interface, intuitive presentation and all the worthwhile features. I like it a lot!
reviews.author: Tim Nelson

reviews.title: Detailed Search
reviews.comment: Your not allowed to search for a particular model/style of the car your looking for. Example: I can not search for only SRT8 Dodge Challengers.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dissapointment
reviews.comment: Everytime I do a search with in 250 miles it shows 2000 miles away and nothing close to my location
reviews.author: Michell Avery

reviews.title: I Agree with 3/28/12 \"Detailed Search\", but
reviews.comment: Will rate 4 stars for now (maybe the screeching Tires increased my score:) I really like this app but I want to search models easily by 4 or 6 cylinders, Base, Limited, Premium, etc. Too much time wasted + gives me a headache searching. Also, when search by dealers inventory how come we can\'t easily search for cars. I know: Blah Blah Blah :) still 4 stars though. Yay
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Boring
reviews.comment: Very basic service. Couldnt find a mercedes in my zip code or within 30 miles. Probably couldnt anything. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: Mark Ditmer

reviews.title: Best car search app, problem with favorites feature
reviews.comment: Succinct and clear display of cars,  more thorough inventory than cars . com.  Love the pictures setup.   However when i click on cars i starred it takes me to some obscure dealership, not the car i selected.   Please fix!
reviews.author: Jim Jordan

reviews.title: Best app for free
reviews.comment: Best kept secret
reviews.author: JASON SAMHAN

reviews.title: Very few listings
reviews.comment: Nice interface, but not many listings. Features of cats not listed.
reviews.author: Rich Kirpach

reviews.title: Excellent source
reviews.comment: Great for finding out info and cars for sale that you want.
reviews.author: Robbie M

reviews.title: This is great!!
reviews.comment: It showed me every car listed and helped me purchase my new vehicle!! Thank you!!
reviews.author: Somalia Daley

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Very handy
reviews.author: Ryan Garriga

reviews.title: waste of a download
reviews.comment: doesnt want to run.  app sucks,  there are so many others that i can use that are better
reviews.author: Leann Hamilton

reviews.comment: The best bought my infiniti g37 because of this
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: The best app ever. Great resource for used car shopping.
reviews.author: Mz Basnight
